https://tmrev.io/movie/316861-Das schönste Geschenk meines Lebens 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/npBtBRUTf3ohh0ciTaLrfsVJ34s.jpg When Barbara Seeberg learns that her husband is having an affair, she resolutely asks the equally charming and likeable kiosk owner Enrico to accompany her on a trip to Italy. However, when Barbara's grown-up children and their feisty mother travel home completely unexpectedly, the tumultuous events recur. - In the romantic comedy "The most beautiful gift of my life", Jutta Speidel ends up on the idyllic coast of Amalfi due to a marital crisis. Das schönste Geschenk meines Lebens
